title: Poster, "Der Schatten", 1966
provenance: Acquired from dealers, galleries and auction houses by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
creditline: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
description:
On white background: 
(1)An inscription at top: "a sezession DER SCHATTEN / Atlas Film presentiert: Clen (Polen 1956) Ein Film von Jerzy Kawalerowicz mit Zygmunt Kestowicz, / Adolf Chronicki / Ein Exklusiv-Programm weltbekannter Filme. Festival-Sieger, umstrittene Filme, beruhmte Aussenseiter und klassische Meisterwerke werden erstmals in deutschen Filmtheatern volgerstellt". 
(2)An image: a 3 x 3 grid, the same image of a inkblot-like human head is repeated with minor alteration in details: in certain sections of the grid, a Nazi swastika, the numbers O5, a stamp with a royal eagle, black dots, black arrow, while some of the heads have cut-out ears, eye, or mouth.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "Der Schatten", 1966.
1966. Offset lithograph on wove paper. Gift of Sara and Marc Benda. 2010-21-12.
